body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! This is Henry Perez from Diamond Pawn Solutions. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Henry. My name is Kimberly Edwards. I'm quite upset because there's a security issue I need to discuss.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Kimberly. We take security very seriously here. Could you please provide me with some details so I can better understand the situation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, of course. I recently visited your store, and I noticed that my personal belongings were not securely stored. This is really concerning to me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Kimberly. We want to ensure the safety of all our customers' belongings. To help resolve this, may I have your phone number and the date of your visit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My phone number is three nine four, five five two, one eight six seven. And I visited your store on the twenty-eighth of March.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kimberly. I have noted down your details. We will investigate this issue immediately and get back to you with a resolution. Your security is our top priority.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Henry. I hope this gets resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I assure you, Kimberly, we will do our utmost to rectify this situation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything for now. Thank you for your help, Henry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Kimberly. Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. Have a great day!
